import React, { useContext } from "react"; import "./CartItems.css"; import { ShopContext } from "../../Context/ShopContext"; import remove_icon from "../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png"; import { Button, Image, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import Table from "react-bootstrap/Table"; const CartItems = () => { const { getTotalCartAmount, all_product, cartItems, removeFromCart } = useContext(ShopContext); return (

3 Larry the Bird @twitter

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

${e.new_price * cartItems[e.id]}

{ removeFromCart(e.id); }} alt="" />
); } return null; })}

 ); }; export default CartItems;
